description:
Baird & Warner's Mobile Application, Powered by Smarter Agent, is taking Chicago area real estate to the next level. This all-new interactive app obtains your location and instantly returns information about homes for sale in the Chicago area. 

Search options include:
•	Homes for Sale
•	Recently Sold Homes
•	Apartments for Rent

You can also search by address, community name, city or zip code to tap into the Chicagoland real estate market.

Search results reveal:
•	Price
•	Beds/baths
•	Square footage
•	Estimated mortgage payment
•	Taxes
•	Interior/exterior features
•	Interactive map
•	Photos

Baird & Warner Mobile is free! Download it today and see the most comprehensive real estate information for Chicagoland available right in the palm of your hand.
